participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

YRBSMS_01.LongName: When you ride a bicycle, how often do you wear a helmet?

Levels.1: I do not ride a bicycle
Levels.5: Most of the time wear a helmet

YRBSMS_02.LongName: When you rollerblade or ride a skateboard, how often do you wear a helmet?

Levels.1: I do not rollerblade or ride a skateboard
Levels.5: Most of the time wear a helmet

YRBSMS_03.LongName: How often do you wear a seatbelt when riding in a car?

YRBSMS_04.LongName: Have you ever ridden in a car driven by someone who had been drinking alcohol?

YRBSMS_05.LongName: Have you ever carried a weapon, such as a gun, knife, or club?

YRBSMS_06.LongName: Have you ever been in a physical fight?

YRBSMS_07.LongName: Have you ever been in a physical fight in which you were hurt and had to be treated by a doctor or nurse?

YRBSMS_08.LongName: Have you ever been bullied on school property?

YRBSMS_9.LongName: Have you ever been electronically bullied? (Include being bullied through e-mail, chat rooms, instant messaging, Web sites, or texting.)

YRBSMS_10.LongName: Have you ever seriously thought about killing yourself?

YRBSMS_11.LongName: Have you ever made a plan about how you would kill yourself?

YRBSMS_12.LongName: Have you ever tried to kill yourself?

YRBSMS_13.LongName: Have you ever tried cigarette smoking, even one or two puffs?

YRBSMS_14.LongName: How old were you when you smoked a whole cigarette for the first time?

Levels.1: I have never smoked a whole cigarette

YRBSMS_15.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigarettes?

YRBSMS_16.LongName: During the past 30 days, on the days you smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke per day?

Levels.1: I did not smoke cigarettes during the past 30 days

YRBSMS_17.LongName: During the past 30 days, how did you usually get your own cigarettes? (Select only one response.)

Levels.1: I did not smoke cigarettes during the past 30 days
Levels.2: I bought them in a store such as a convenience store, supermarket, discount store, or gas station
Levels.3: I bought them from a vending machine
Levels.4: I gave someone else money to buy them for more
Levels.5: I borrowed (or bummed) them from someone else
Levels.6: A person 18 years old or older gave them to me
Levels.7: I took them from a store or family member
Levels.8: I got them some other way

YRBSMS_18.LongName: Have you ever smoked cigarettes daily, that is, at least one cigarette every day for 30 days?

YRBSMS_19.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use chewing tobacco, snuff, or dip, such as Redman, Levi Garrett, Beechnut, Skoal, Skoal Bandits, or Copenhagen?

YRBSMS_20.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigars, cigarillos, or little cigars?

YRBSMS_21.LongName: Have you ever had a drink of alcohol, other than a few sips?

YRBSMS_22.LongName: How old were you when you had your first drink of alcohol other than a few sips?

Levels.1: I have never had a drink of alcohol other than a few sips

YRBSMS_24.LongName: How old were you when you tried marijuana for the first time?

YRBSMS_25.LongName: Have you ever used any form of cocaine, including powder, crack, or freebase?

YRBSMS_26.LongName: Have you ever sniffed glue, breathed the contents of spray cans, or inhaled any paints or sprays to get high?

YRBSMS_27.LongName: Have you ever taken steroid pills or shots without a doctor's prescription?

YRBSMS_28.LongName: Have you ever taken a prescription drug (such as OxyContin, Percocet, Vicodin, codeine, Adderall, Ritalin, or Xanax) without a doctor's prescription?

YRBSMS_29.LongName: Have you ever had sexual intercourse?

YRBSMS_30.LongName: How old were you when you had sexual intercourse for the first time?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSMS_31.LongName: With how many people have you ever had sexual intercourse?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSMS_32.LongName: The last time you had sexual intercourse, did you or your partner use a condom?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSMS_34.LongName: Which of the following are you trying to do about your weight?

Levels.4: I am not trying to do anything about my weight

YRBSMS_35.LongName: Have you ever gone without eating for 24 hours or more (also called fasting) to lose weight or to keep from gaining weight?

YRBSMS_36.LongName: Have you ever taken any diet pills, powders, or liquids without a doctor's advice to lose weight or to keep from gaining weight? (Do not include meal replacement products such as Slim Fast.)

YRBSMS_37.LongName: Have you ever vomited or taken laxatives to lose weight or to keep from gaining weight?

YRBSMS_38.LongName: During the past 7 days, on how many days were you physically active for a total of at least 60 minutes per day? (Add up all the time you spent in any kind of physical activity that increased your heart rate and made you breathe hard some of the time.)

YRBSMS_39.LongName: On an average school day, how many hours do you watch TV?

Levels.1: I do not watch TV on an average school day

YRBSMS_40.LongName: On an average school day, how many hours do you play video or computer games or use a computer for something that is not school work? (Include activities such as Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo DS, iPod touch, Facebook, and the Internet.)

Levels.1: I do not play video or computer games or use a computer for something that is not school work

YRBSMS_41.LongName: In an average week when you are in school, on how many days do you go to physical education (PE) classes?

YRBSMS_42.LongName: During the past 12 months, on how many sports teams did you play? (Count any teams run by your school or community groups.)

YRBSMS_43.LongName: Have you ever been taught about AIDS or HIV infection in school?

YRBSMS_44.LongName: Has a doctor or nurse ever told you that you have asthma?
